title: Isekai Maou Gokko
alternative_title: Isekai Maou Gokko ; 異世界魔王ごっこ ; Playing the Demon Lord in Another World
status: Isekai Maou Gokko ; 異世界魔王ごっこ ; Playing the Demon Lord in Another World
description:
Description :
        Nono Sasaki is an ordinary girl who loves playing video games. However, one day, she gets into an accident and is summoned in the world of the game… as the Demon Lord!
